food_item.name: casserole
food_item.ingredients: 8 ounces bulk breakfast sausage, crumbled 1 medium onion, chopped 1 medium green bell pepper, chopped 6 eggs, 1 cup milk, 1 tablespoon McCormick® Oregano Leaves, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon McCormick® Coarse Ground Black Pepper, 1 1/2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese, 1 cup crumbled feta cheese, 2 plum tomatoes, seeded and chopped, 1 tablespoon oil, 1 package (20 ounces) refrigerated shredded hash browns

food_item.ingredients: 8 ounces bulk breakfast sausage, crumbled 1 medium onion, chopped 1 medium green bell pepper, chopped 6 eggs, 1 cup milk, 1 tablespoon McCormick® Oregano Leaves, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon McCormick® Coarse Ground Black Pepper, 1 1/2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese, 1 cup crumbled feta cheese, 2 plum tomatoes, seeded and chopped, 1 tablespoon oil, 1 package (20 ounces) refrigerated shredded hash browns
